lenders.name: Lightbearers
lenders.occupational_info: We are all employees and alumni of a non-profit graduate school in Santa Monica, California, supporting and practicing the skills of spiritual psychology.

lenders.name: Chase
lenders.loan_because:
"freely as I have been given freely I give."
Jesus gave me my life back!!
lenders.occupational_info: Architecture

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: God filled me with so much love that I cannot keep it to myself. I have to share that love with everyone. Everyone needs to be loved.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I love God

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I like the program and the ability to connect globally with someone who is motivated to pursue their dreams and be accountable for seeing it through.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support to pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies developing new medicines

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it encourages the entrepreneurial spirit

lenders.name: Bil and Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: WE see potential in hardworking people like yourselves to better your economic situation.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people with a wide range of physical and psychological problems.

lenders.name: AVert
lenders.occupational_info: Managing software development

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a comfortable life, and feel that it is my moral obligation to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, sell and build satellite communications networks.

lenders.name: Yarkasi
lenders.loan_because: want to start multimedia busines , Computer service, computer hard ware supplyer

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: People need help, and this is such a small thing to do.

lenders.name: Curtis
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care, because we are all human, and we are all life, and no one deserves to be deprived of any quality of life. I have everything I need, now it's time someone else did too!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student

lenders.name: David & Margaret
lenders.loan_because: It's a great chance to help others who have a need. We are both blessed & lucky - and have the opportunity to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a few small businesses we have started (in New Zealand) - some are succeeding & the others aren't losing too much money ..

lenders.name: Nick Brown
lenders.loan_because: I won the Super Bowl pool at work and this is better than blowing it at Best Buy

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: Other people helped me, and now it is my turn to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I design office space.  My specialty is interior office design, and most of my clients are small business owners.

lenders.name: Caryn
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have and want to share.  I trust that this method of sharing really makes a difference in the lives of people who receive the loans.  I have loaned a little bit.  If I see that is successful, I will loan more.  And when that is repaid, loan it again. . .
lenders.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries--especially spine injuries--with manual therapy as well as exercise instruction.  You can see where I work at www.balancept.org

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it's offering a helping hand.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I have had many people help me and I am now able to give back to others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with blood borne pathogens.

lenders.name: Robinson House
lenders.loan_because: Robinson House leads the way in fundraising!
lenders.occupational_info: 87 boys ranging from Year 9 - 12 at Camberwell Grammar School

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do, and it makes me feel good.

lenders.name: gad
lenders.loan_because: i like to help if i can.

lenders.name: Gørild
lenders.loan_because: I have seen close up how little money is needed to get started with a small business in a development country, and the smile it puts on people's faces when they have work to go to and how good it feels to be able to provide basic things as food, clothes and toiletries to your own family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a translator and writer, and often work with information concerning the environment, international aid, tourism etc.

lenders.name: jan christian
lenders.loan_because: I want help people around the world improve their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have been emotionally hurt.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I can give financial support directly to those in need.

lenders.name: Kali RS
lenders.occupation: Non-Profit employee by day, Entrepreneur by night
lenders.loan_because: Contributing to micro-financing means contributing to eradicating poverty - one person at a time! I am an entrepreneur too, and I believe that small business is the key to eliminating poverty. It makes me feel good to be able to help someone achieve their goals, even if I can't be there to help with my hands or my contacts.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small business owner who provides marketing services to small business owners (writing, editing, social media and consulting) in Calgary.

lenders.name: Mr. Z
lenders.loan_because: My dad would have felt it was important to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to guide the youth of America

lenders.name: valerie and wendy
lenders.loan_because: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.--George Bernard Shaw
lenders.occupational_info: Teachers by profession. Students of life.

lenders.name: Ray and Alison
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to help people who wish to help themselves and their families.  I also want to teach my grandchild about giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for Coca Cola for many years in sales and distribution.

lenders.name: Otso
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance changes the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping those that help themselves. Kiva does not take the place of pure charity but is a way of sharing person to person.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: Giving shouldn't be limited to a traditonal avenues (i.e church).
lenders.occupational_info: My daily job involves facilitating aid to disaster victims.

lenders.name: Sougo
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist in the person who challenges a bold target.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a software researcher and engineer to think, find, and develop new communication software.

lenders.name: Sheri & Pete
lenders.loan_because: it is great to help whereever you can.
lenders.occupational_info: We sit in a cubicle all day, far removed from a window or door shuffling paperwork.  We both love gardening and cooking and working with our hands so it's not fun being stuck inside all day.

lenders.name: Jason & Maggie
lenders.whereabouts: San Francisco, CA & Seattle, WA MA
lenders.loan_because: if you have much, give of your wealth; if you have little, give of your heart (~Arabian proverb); OR give some of both by lending with Kiva

lenders.name: Mary Lou
lenders.occupational_info:
my day job is teaching people how to improve their health by keeping their gums healthy.
my night job is making jewelry using copper wire and stones to make jewelry;  a portion of the proceeds from this hobby will fund my kiva account.

lenders.name: Joanie
lenders.loan_because: People are the most important thing.

lenders.name: Dan & Beth
lenders.loan_because: Why would we not?  We have been blessed and enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it is good for humanity
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a economist

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I love to give back.

lenders.name: Olusegun
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I know the impact of not having enough money to run your business. 
Also, it is very important for humanity to reach out.
lenders.occupational_info: If we all chip in, we can make a big difference in people's life

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: We get by with a little help from our friends.

lenders.name: Janža Krasnič
lenders.loan_because: I simply love the entrepreneurial spirit!

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out in anyway I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a stay-at-home mom who feels blessed to be able to do so.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact on the lives of others. If I can help a community through the passion of 1 person, imagine what that community can do for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a social entrepreneur, working to improve the lives of others in my community and those around me.

lenders.name: HecLiz
lenders.loan_because: It helps.

lenders.name: matt
lenders.occupational_info: Invest in early stage startups

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because:
Someone gave me a gift certificate for KIVA. 

Then too, I was helped to start my business by a great many people with big hearts and want to repay the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run a restaurant and rental houses and apartments.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe that no one should be prevented from being able to exploit opportunities to make their lives better
lenders.occupational_info: I help public sector organizations improve their operations

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because:
it's nice to know that you're helping deserving people :)
Thanks to a good friend of mine, Duane who gave me this idea.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have so much compared to many and I know how hard it can be for women in the world to feed and clothe their families.  I read about SEWA Bank when I was an undergrad in Anthropology and was so impressed by the idea - I'm glad I can help in a small way - that I don't need to have hundreds of dollars to make a difference, and I am teaching my daughter about how easy it can be to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am first and foremost a mother and a wife.  My main goal in life is to raise my daughter to make a difference.  I am also a writer of children's fiction, as well as an executive assistant/office manager for an author/editor/agent who has worked with some of the world's great visionaries, such as Archbishop Desmond Tutu.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: If  we don't help  or assist who will. Plus it been a long time since i have done something good. I remember when my family needed assistance, so i do i have a understand that i should help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very busy and fast palce job. So i understand the need to help others.

lenders.name: Gunvar
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a greate way to help others make a living for themselfe and others.
lenders.occupational_info: Im working as an Engineer in the Oil buissines

lenders.name: Mat
lenders.loan_because: I've witnessed first hand the power of entrepreneurship while working for ACCION International.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I loan to give others peace and hope.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own and operate a plumbing business.  I also have 3 children and a nursing degree.

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.loan_because: Scripture says I should help the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I help raise funds to help the poor and spread the Gospel in Peru.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if you help others, you will in return receive blessings of your own, and you will grow to know yourself better.  - Attitude of Gratitude
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves installing and maintaining digital radiology equipment in hospitals and clinics throughout the north east United States.  I am also an independent representative of North American Power and American Wind, focusing on renewable wind energy for a better planet and better future.

lenders.name: Marc-Andre
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live in a trouble-free part of the world and this a great way for me to share this repeatedly.
lenders.occupational_info: I find what makes people have fun and feel clever and skillful.

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: I can and this is something I believe in
lenders.occupational_info: I am a figurative sculptor who uses cloth as my medium

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of capitalism and small business.  I believe that people everywhere deserve a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: My faith in Jesus Christ compels me to do all the good I can!

lenders.name: Nataleigh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity and that everyone deserves a chance to make something out of themselves.

lenders.name: Fenella
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping women in other areas of the world improve the circumstances of their family and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a team of people building a tram system in the capital of Scotland. I do a little bit of everything to help them do their job. I also try to help the team be friendly and happy.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of giving the average person the ability to help the owners of small businesses throughout the world with the loans they need to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a web developer, developing computer-based training courses.

lenders.name: John & Katharine Armijo
lenders.loan_because:
We will gladly help anyone that is willing to help themselves. 

Obviously, people in other countries don't always have access to the priveleges that we do as Americans.

If we can share some of the fortunate priveleges we have access to with others, so be it!

We've been down and out before, and worked our way out of it. These people asking for help are in the same boat, and deserve a bit of support.
lenders.occupational_info:
My wife and I own three business. My wife is a photographer, I run a business which sells collectables and movie memorabilia, and we own a childrens indoor playground.

We are on New Orleans Northshore, in St Tammany Parish.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: microloans have the ability to reduce poverty and increase self-esteem.
E

lenders.name: Unitarian Universalist
lenders.loan_because: We are a congregation looking to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We get involved in many community projects such as soup kitchens and peace vigils.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I try to be the change I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the very best way to make a difference in the lives of individuals, especially women trying to support themselves and their families.  It makes me very happy to help in this small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I spent most of my career working with kidney patients, but now work with rehabilitation patients, mostly recovering from knee and hip surgeries, strokes, and brain injuries.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families and raise their children out of poverty. Micro-finance is the most empowering way of doing that. Bravo Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 small children, and I work as a public relations consultant on large infrastructure projects.

lenders.name: MouMou Hamou
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful idea!   Money I can spare may make a real difference in someone's life.  Thank you Kiva for making this possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a recently retired medical technologist.  I worked in a hospital laboratory, mostly testing blood.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: my husband and I have been privileged to travel around the world, and Kiva affords us to pay back the hospitality of the people we've met in many beautiful countries

lenders.name: Forbes
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and others have much less than I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I now have time to catch up on all the little things I have not been able to do over the years.

lenders.name: Ella
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We should all try and give back if we can
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small business.

lenders.name: Wil
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who work hard and strive to get ahead.

lenders.name: Georgianna
lenders.occupational_info: I do data entry, filing, and bookkeeping for a real estate appraisal firm owned by my two sons.

lenders.name: Daggi
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: "If not you, who?  If not now, when?"  These are the words of a Metal of Honor recipient.  These word sprouted from conflict but certainly can and should be applied to prosperity and self-empowerment around the planet.  We are very happy to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self-employed General Contractor performing repair and renovation work here in the San Francisco Bay Area.   I have been in business for 28 years.   My wife works at Kaiser Hospital in ongoing procedural health education for nurses and doctors.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is no one's fault. We all have to help each other out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently finishing my Political Science undergraduate degree.  During the summers, I take pictures of tourists dressed up in 19th century costume at Upper Canada Village (a pioneer village).

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: strangers helped me in the past so it is my turn now and I am lucky to be able to do it.  We can make this world better one by one.

lenders.name: Zack
Kris Lozano
lenders.loan_because:
We believe educating our children about charity begins with our example.  We'd like them to learn that most of the world struggles to survive on what we would consider "disposable income" (Thereby creating gratitude for what we have).   

Matthew 24:40 say, "Whatever you did for the least of these brothers of mine...you've done for me."
lenders.occupational_info: We both work educating young people about the effects of drugs and alcohol and teach them how they can fulfill their dreams and their potential in life.

lenders.name: Robert.J
lenders.loan_because: social investing has the highest dividends - our BIG family feels less pain. The funds were established to allow children and grandchildren to learn about social investing, how to count their blessings, and how precious a gift it is to ourselves to help others
lenders.occupational_info: ...i am long since retired, and off on a new sailing adventure...

lenders.name: Patrice Schmidt
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in poverty and I am blessed now and want to bless others. This is a fantastic way to give people the opportunity to have a permanent solution to their situation instead of giving them the proverbial fish to feed them for a day, only to have them back in a position of need tomorrow. I want to give them a hand-up rather than a hand-out. It is wonderful to be able to help provide a lasting solution to someone that is perhaps thousands of miles away. They are intelligent and talented people who were born, or had sometimes fallen, into unfortunate circumstances; they are mothers, fathers, daughters, and sons...not just charity cases to be pitied. This program and its Field Partners enable people to have dignity and allow them to be an integral part of developing their community's economy, which in turn helps many more people thrive. In turn, those communities need to be encouraged to help those who are truly unable to support themselves - the orphans, those with severe disabilities, the elderly, etc.  I love this program!!!

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I think it's fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I figure out what products my company should make, and what price they should be sold at, to optimize profitability.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: i believe that all people should have the resources they need to be successful and happy in their own right and by their own means.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I thought this was a dating site.  :) Also, I believe in crisis relief.  Or sending 20 bucks so that a kid gets basic immunizations or clean drinking water.  But the real goal here is that humans have food, shelter, and access to education and healthcare.  The real goal is to give a child a chance to reach her potential.  So how do we move towards that goal?  I can't buy it.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy life insurance on major corporations and then hope they die.

lenders.name: john   South Miami, FL
lenders.loan_because: My daughter, Chloe, gave me a $50 KIVA gift certificate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Florida Department of Transportation.  My job is to obtain the various environmental permits needed to build and improve the stateroads and bridges in South Florida.  In order to obtain these permits, I must demonstrate that the construction projects will not harm  the environment.

lenders.name: Rudy Chery
lenders.loan_because: when I have I give.
lenders.occupational_info: I can’t complain, how are things working out on your side?

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed so much by God that I would like to share His Love to others too!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently serving as a youth pastor. There's nothing better than to serve my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: we are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach my son at home, and I help others do the same for their children.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.occupational_info: health care

lenders.name: Kia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a designer and illustrator.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all should work together to help one another.  We are ONE in this big global village.
lenders.occupational_info: By day, I help facilitate gifting to help reduce the amount of things that go to waste.  In my free time, I am a mixed media artist who always has more projects in her mind than those which are completed.  :)

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed and I want to help individuals get that chance to succeed

lenders.name: Kadey's Angels
lenders.loan_because: This loan is in part a gift on behalf of our friend Kadey on her 33rd birthday, and in part of our desire to make a small difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who are website designers, educators, online marketers and event planners.

lenders.name: Kazoo
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the growing small business entrepreneurship all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We have lots of fun learning English and a lot other things together and from each other.

lenders.name: Nichole
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world around me.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to end extreme poverty. I believe this is one of the best ways to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am making documentaries to help fuel the progress of organizations like Kiva. My production company is called Speak Up Productions (speakupproductionsco.com) and I am currently directing the film Give A Damn? (giveadamndoc.com) Give A Damn?'s goal is to challenge the next generation to end extreme poverty through a film & movement.

lenders.name: Brian Gibbs
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe everyone should have the opportunity to succeed and that money shouldn't be the thing that holds them back.
lenders.occupational_info: My company develops and designs custom websites for small/medium businesses.

lenders.name: Soroptimist Thunder Bay
lenders.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of women.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all professional women actively working and retired

lenders.name: Ira
lenders.loan_because: my children (see pix) gave me a gift of a loan certificate which I am using to better the lives of people who with a little help can better their lives and the lives of those close to them
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior executive in an insurance brokerage firm. helping to protect businesses and individuals from financial disaster

lenders.name: Gigi
lenders.loan_because: I have enough.
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: Helping women entrepreneurs is the most meaningful way I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: Using beauty to encourage business

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough throughout my life to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a drug manufacturing facility.  We work to maintain a clean and sterile environment to help ensure drug safety

lenders.name: Ellis
lenders.loan_because: I want to foster free enterprise and entrepreneurship around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 10 and 11 year old boys and girls in a public school in a town of approximately 20,000 people in the northwest corner of the United States.

lenders.name: Demetria
lenders.loan_because: It is essential in our global world that we work towards the success of all peoples. We as a world cannot be free unless all people are safe, fed and know we are looking out for each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with women as a midwife, doula and train women to be doulas. Doulas support women in labor to have the safe birth they want.

lenders.name: Ernie
lenders.loan_because: having seen what just a few dollars can do to improve lives in poorer countries, it is nice to just try to help out a bit.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: When I read about Kiva, assisting people to succeed on their own seemed like a good idea
lenders.occupational_info: Capturing life and posting it

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people become successful in making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Bad Cat
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to make a difference, one step at a time.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with health, family, freedom., and meaningful work. I want to help others achieve their own dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a small college. My students are in their 1st and 2nd year of college. I teach study skills, humanities, and multicultural studies.

lenders.name: Indraneel
lenders.loan_because: feels good

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in Los Angeles, California.

lenders.name: Laurent et Michèle
lenders.loan_because: it's usefull for people all other the world
lenders.occupational_info: work in a hospital for children

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: can't think of anything better to do with my money
lenders.occupational_info: jack of all trades, master of none

lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Giulia
lenders.loan_because: empowering is more powerful than just giving...
lenders.occupational_info: I design digital services to address people real needs. I strongly believe everyone should have the opportunity to live the life they dream. Thank you Kiva!

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a community health centre that serves the most marginalized and vulnerable in the community.

lenders.name: Chad & Melissa
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those with less opportunity.

lenders.name: Emmanuel
lenders.loan_because: Always i wanted to become Entrepreneur which would lift my economic and made others Entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: My work need a lot of patient and obey because is very diffcult job to climb Mount Killimanjaro the highest mt in Africa,Very cold.Wind,also you must  be able to cross culture because you work with different people from different country.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I have little. They have less.

lenders.name: Massimo
lenders.loan_because: People in the "first world" like to complain all the time about those poors and ingnorants who pollute their existence. They are ignorant themselves and they lose the mean of solidarity. Microcredit is the best way to help some people to DO something and control their own existence: now they see a brighter future. No charity, just some real help.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult companies on strategy, organisation, governance, quality and security of their information system (so their entire company). I also help them to innovate.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I study organizational psychology.  I hope to work with organizations to make jobs more meaningful and enjoyable.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: it's a great joy to be able to reach out in this way..
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently writing a Ph.D. thesis about the history of the theology of lending money
I am preparing to be a teacher at the college and seminary level.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes for the United States Navy.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I have known want and the kindness of others.  Now that God has given me the means, I can give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work 500 miles away from my home for 2 weeks at a time.  I work on the oil pipeline in Alaska.

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I was given a credit of $25.00 as a gift and enjoyed the process of looking at the loans and helping out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with marital problems, and help people do wills sell their homes.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and want to help give a headstart to others less fortunate.

lenders.name: Irina
lenders.loan_because: I must.

lenders.name: C.J.
lenders.loan_because: I highly respect any business person who has an entrepreneurial spirit!  I think that Kiva.org is a great avenue to encourage and support businesses and individuals around the world.   I am specifically signing up for providing loans, in honor of our dear family dog, Sadie, who recently died.  I want to honor her life by providing money to a wonderful cause.

lenders.name: Khayree
lenders.loan_because: I'm about giving back and helping people who might not be as fortunate as we are in our country,and I think this is a tremendous way of bridging the gaps and bringing the world together.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an Independent Record label by name of RICTASCALE RECORDS LLC, and work can get stressful and time consuming but this is my dream and god gave me the talent and the means to make it happen so I gotta do whatever it takes to get the job done at the end of the day.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is to feel helplessness, although perhaps not in the same sense. This is a way that I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I ski for the U.S. Paralympic Alpine Team.

lenders.name: Rogers
lenders.loan_because: I want to start up my own Business which can sustain the community and our country at large.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically I want to do the Business which has already attained experience because I can ran it the reason being I know the skills involved and it's strategies.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: As a follower of Jesus I am called to put my faith into action.  One way I strive to do this is by showing love to the poor and oppressed.  I'm fortunate enough to have resources to share, and this is a great way to share what God has given me.

lenders.name: Petr
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it really easy and fun to provide other people with needed funds.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I think these small loans can make a difference for entrepreneurs in  the world.  Hopefully more potential lenders can get the message and make these loans!
lenders.occupational_info: Semi-retired business person.  I know what it means to struggle starting a new business.

lenders.name: Rini
lenders.loan_because: Realizing I am a happy woman with lots of opportunities and a wonderful life, I asked my guests at my 50th birthday  to give a present to another woman around the globe to built her own life.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I am glad that there are people out there, whose lives I can touch in a meaningful way. It is good to know that a small act really can make a huge difference in another's life.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible to give to each other freely of the blessings we have.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to teach high school students Spanish when I am done with school!

lenders.name: Leighanna
lenders.loan_because: i believe in equalizing social justice

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to help my fellow.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I like to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with pipes and valves in a big factory

lenders.name: Robleh
lenders.loan_because: I admire all these enterprising people and I believe encouraging their creativity is the best way to help them.

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: It is needed and I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teachers, parents, students, and community members to create learning environments that inspire teaching and learning and create community

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: We're all connected.

lenders.name: Maren
lenders.loan_because: I think that giving someone an opportunity to make their life better for themselves is a greater thing to do than to just simply give them a couple meals or temporary shelter.  Teach a man to fish... right?

lenders.name: Lyle
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!!   Just image what the world would be like if every country and every person had the same opportunities to be successful and enjoy life!!

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are attempting improve their circumstance through entrepreneurial endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop system protection and control designs for an electrical utility company.  The electrical configuration that I design monitors and protects the equipment associated with the power system.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: my "little" can be someone elses "a lot".
lenders.occupational_info: i take photographs

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: To give the same opportunity given to me.

lenders.name: The Mega-Gs
lenders.loan_because: so many people have helped us throughout our lives.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Jesus has a heart for the poor, and I want to be like Jesus.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: I like the direct connection Kiva offers between lender and borrower.  I like watching the people I help succeed.  And, because I am able.
lenders.occupational_info: Purchasing agent for a promotional products company.

lenders.name: al & miho
lenders.loan_because: Compassion. The love for our fellow living beings and the wisdom of how to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We are world citizens, the environment must be saved and the power of nature to heal be respected.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than I.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work involves the transfer of the risk of a loss, from one entity to another, in exchange for a premium, 

Example:  Fire burns your business building and business property.  I provide coverage to replace your building and all your business property for a premium.

lenders.name: Machelle
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help people start businesses that will give them the ability to improve their lives.  A relatively small amount can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Barth
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and give back because I am so blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations achieve their goals through improved internal communication, planning and manager-employee relationships.

lenders.name: Tom & Josette
lenders.loan_because: I love micro credits. I think they are a GREAT way to improve people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of computer programmers.

lenders.name: AuntieKyleKelseyPatrick
lenders.loan_because: As a family we are very blessed and we want to give back to those less fortunate than us.  Giving like this can help others have a better life, and it makes us feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: Auntie Laura helps get computing technology to large global companies all around the world.  Kyle, Kelsey & Patrick are students in Wisconsin who are becoming "global citizens" through travel with Auntie and the understanding of people & cultures all around the world.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others. Everyone is entitled to a better life.

lenders.name: My kids Jesse & Desiree
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mom who is trying hard to get an education to take care of my children, and this is the least I can do to help another person in need. My children have offered to help with this loan so they will get to see how much power they hold to do good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time graduate student working on my social work degree. I will use this degree to help those in need, those without a voice, those who the world thinks has no power.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I've had a really great run the past nine years. Before then it was a rough time, but thanks to a generous private lender I was able to complete a MSc degree. I repaid her, and now with Kiva I can do the same on a smaller scale. What goes around, comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to operate printing presses. These are sold by my employer all over the world.

lenders.name: Wes
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Manager for a Trucking company

lenders.name: Iril
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, especially women, with their dreams of a better future and life for themselves and their family. I like KIVA because I can choose what/who to support. I am most interested in supporting farming and agriculture projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the editor of a magazine about how to take care of your house and garden.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.

lenders.name: Dennis & Penny
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build, and maintain computer systems

lenders.name: Magictrix
lenders.loan_because: Coz we are all in this together
lenders.occupational_info: I'm being raised by two beautiful girls, and work part time as a support person for a woman with some physical & communication limitations

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to help others fight poverty and improve the lives of their familes and communities

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I believe that its every persons duty, if possible to give back to those that are less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Worlwide recognized brand and provide products and services to people around the world

lenders.name: nys
lenders.loan_because: I know I would want someone to help me out too.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people who are willing to work, as opposed to giving a handout.

lenders.name: Jay, Andria, Zach
lenders.loan_because: Periodic lapses in near-perfect self involvement.

lenders.name: David C.
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my abundance with people and fulfill their dreams across the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I support companies' local and wide area networks so their computers can stay up and functional.

lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to directly lend my love, support , and encouragement to individual people for their specific endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that helps doctors give books to children who don't have them.

lenders.name: Jim & Ann
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed and believe we are called to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Scotty
lenders.occupation: Retired U.S. Air Force - Now an AF Consultant
lenders.loan_because: it's time for us to all come together or we're all in BIG trouble!
lenders.occupational_info: I served 23 years in the U.S. Air Force  and retired at the age of 40 in January 2004.  I now work for a firm handling many government contracts including my project involving Air Force Data Systems.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: my daughter in law gave me a gift certificate

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I am spending so much money on things I don't really need, so I guess I should give at least some to people who do something useful with it.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: "What ever you do for the least of these, you do unto Me".
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures of people. :)

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: Something small can do so much

lenders.name: Lillian
lenders.loan_because: I can personally help an individual across the world.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed in many ways in my life. People helped me at different times, and it's payback time. And this is the best program I've come across in years.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in diverse communication and theatre-related fields

lenders.name: Matt & Megan Wagner
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our hope for a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers for a large bank in the United States. We also own a small business that converts music collections for use on computers.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I think providing budding capitalists with the money to accomplish their dreams is the most effective way of improving the living standards of the world.

lenders.name: Nel
lenders.loan_because:
I hope to help Moluccan people who wants to build up their village in the Moluccan.

There are many Moluccans who do the best, but they do not have the money.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: I have experienced need in my life . . . dire need at times.  I know first hand the feeling of relief that results in receiving desperately needed aid.  That is why I am so pleased to have stumbled upon this program.  The loans I make are in memory of my mother, Olga, and in honor of my father Nicholas, both of whom shared and share so generously with my brother and me.  Glory to God for all things!

lenders.name: Spenjorba
lenders.loan_because: we like to share what we have with people
lenders.occupational_info: We go to school and learn math, social studies, Japanese, and drama

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I love my brothers and sisters & as a wise King once said, "when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God." King Benjamin
lenders.occupational_info: I Serve & Protect. It’s like being a Jedi, but without a lightsaber.  :)

lenders.name: Henrietta
lenders.loan_because: I can empower people to improve their lives without demeaning them with hand outs.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.occupation: Retired - Owned Stores & Computer Sys. businesses

lenders.name: Jasmin
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have grown up in a country without war, to have a good education and a stable economy. If fate had brought my parents "back home" , it could be my family or even myself applying for a micro finance loan today. I strongly believe in helping others to help themselves and a small loan to start a business can change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my time in front of a computer.

lenders.name: Dass
lenders.loan_because: If you have the ability to help someone, why wouldn't you?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a New Zealand university student with a part time job in retail.

lenders.name: urban grind
lenders.loan_because: It is the kindness of others that has seen my business become what it is. It has also been the good heart of those that never doubted that I could do anything and that is what I want to offer others. All our loans are funded by our tips jar. So the loans are funded by our customers and staff who donate their tips to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a coffee shop. Through my coffee shop I build a local community. I want  you to know that you are a part of my world.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: its the least i can do.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: I feel good helping people
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the mobile phone industry

lenders.name: Ram
lenders.loan_because: they will put it to better use than me

lenders.name: Stephanie and Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that one should "be the change you wish to see in the world" (~ Mahatma Gandhi). There is no reason for poverty to exist, and I believe micro-finance to be one of the best methods through which the world can achieve the goal of eradicating poverty world-wide.

lenders.name: CIMBA
lenders.loan_because: We are building an ongoing fund to enable students to participate in socially responsible activities currently our efforts are focused through KIVA
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students based in Asolo, Italy.

lenders.name: jiri
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in U. S. can do it.
lenders.occupational_info: green building, using natural, cheap and available materials.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: the gap between the developed world and the developing world is apalling.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we were created to be helpful to others. Besides: I'm a teacher--I still think that I can make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach languages, and a part of that is promoting an understanding and appreciation of differences in people and cultures.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I makes me feel good and I enjoy helping entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Executive in a garment company that designs and manufactures apparel for US major retailers

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that, at some point, everybody on this planet needs a helping hand. I've been through hardships in my life and there were family and friends to help me through. This is the very least that I can do to help others.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I don't consider money an end unto itself, and I'm happiest making other people happy.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Giving someone a better day today, (than yesterday), will help them toward an even better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: Started out serving my country (as a WWII & Korean War Marine)... became a VISTA in 2005 and spent a year on Katrina recovery...then as an AmeriCorps VISTA Leader for California's San Joaquin Valley Region. Currently I have gone back to being just a VISTA... working on a new VISTA project we have named "Main Street Values." As may be obvious I am still determined to go out in service to my country. I'm 83, my heart operates on a pacemaker/defibrilator and I can't run a mile in under 4 minutes... but I will get to the finish line with a smile on my face... was I the oldest active VISTA??? A good question... in search of an answer.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Its nice to be able to help people who want to work to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: After working as a chemical engineer I have now 'retired' and work in a school.

lenders.name: Book Group Women
lenders.occupation: We're a group of friends who are lending together

lenders.name: Daisy
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: brooke
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, I really do and...so should YOU!!!

lenders.name: Broomfield Academy
lenders.loan_because: We want to be part of the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a second grade class at Broomfield Academy in Broomfield, Colorado.

lenders.name: acissej zenatro
lenders.loan_because: because of the wonderful things that are

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the people I loan to.  I admire their willingness to work hard to improve the lives of their families and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide training and technical help to small communities with operating and maintaining their drinking water and waste water systems.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.occupational_info: Engineering Philosophy

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I like to help those who are working hard to improve their family's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy chemical raw materials which my company uses to help clean water around the world.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: any gesture can change the world

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: "to whom much is given, much will be required"

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled extensively and found that people can be ethical and "good" regardless of where they were born.  I have done well and want to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired military helicopter pilot.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people help them selves and get a better life.

lenders.name: Havar
lenders.loan_because:
"You must be the change you want to see in the world.."
Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that Kiva, and the process of lending money to entrepreneurs in third world countries is an amazing way to provide assistance, and allows me to do my small part to better the world.

It's makes me feel more alive and part of the world when I see that entrepreneurs around the world can benefit from all of our investments
lenders.occupational_info: I am an international currency dealer.  When someone wants to invest in the currency of a war torn country I get that currency for them.

lenders.name: Ilya
lenders.loan_because: it's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage web development projects (like web sites such as kiva.org) from start to finish.

lenders.name: Tom,Tracey,Sofia & Alex
lenders.loan_because: we can, and it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I am very grateful for the blessings and abundance in my life.  I want to share this with others and help them grow abundance in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help managers discover better ways of working with thier staff to improve their performance and their satisfaction at work.

lenders.name: Bruce and Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I am constantly amazed what a little bit of money in the right hands will do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with mathematics and statistics for the U.S. Army

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want nothing more in my entire life than to make a positive impact in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am mostly a student, but recently got a new job in which I work with individuals who have mental and physical disabilities and help them live relatively independent lives.

lenders.name: Elias
lenders.loan_because: my auntie made me by giving me a kiva gift as a first birthday present. Bless her!

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women support themselves and their families.  I hope these loans improve the quality of their lives and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the fund-raising database for a nonprofit organization.

lenders.name: Kamini
lenders.loan_because: It seems like the best way to do something good with the money I make, and to be a positive force in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct research on groundwater contamination and teach at a large public university in the U.S.

lenders.name: Phil & Hillary
lenders.loan_because: We believe that as followers of Christ we are called to give. I love the idea and the action of micro-lending and would love to see it evolve even further!

lenders.name: Manish
lenders.loan_because: Makes me feel better when "Loan" and not "alms" are received by someone deserving.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nate and Leah
lenders.loan_because: We've been given plenty and want to share that with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Leah teaches college students; Nate writes about computers and the Internet.

lenders.name: Lou & Sue
lenders.loan_because: We can,     it is good,    we choose to.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: you should.

lenders.name: anita
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am able to, and because I  believe I am my sisters' keeper.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Helping people create business opportunities makes for more jobs and improves the world.  Kiva is a great organization.  And I want to have a part of making the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest Job Site in the US and work with employers to find good employees

lenders.name: Cope
lenders.loan_because: I'd rather give up my bank's 3% interest rate to help others

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to be good
lenders.occupational_info: understanding busisness problems and devising concrete solutions.

lenders.name: Grerrit  & Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: God gave us many blessings.and we wish others the same.

lenders.name: K Meyer
lenders.loan_because: To support manufacturing and business entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: Resources, tools, and communities supporting lean manufacturing and lean enterprise excellence.

lenders.name: Pingo.com Phone Cards
lenders.loan_because: We are a global prepaid calling card provider. We work with people to make international calls worldwide. We loan to help the global community and donate global phone cards to several global charity organizations as well as supporting are troops overseas.
lenders.occupational_info: www.Pingo.com is a global telecom voip provider that helps people make international calls worldwide. We provide a clean prepaid global phone card service to keep the world connected for a whole lot less.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: By loaning rather than giving, not only can the funds be reused and make more of a difference, but the borrowers learn how to manage their money as a business, which helps them long after the money is repaid.
lenders.occupational_info: Mathematics

lenders.name: Emmy
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I enjoy the feeling of knowing you helped someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work I am still in school

lenders.name: Natalia
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to my daughter's present -K iva gift certificate, I can take part in realization of the dreams and ideas which probably can make the world better.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact in the world and I believe I can accomplish this by helping other people.
lenders.occupational_info: When I graduate this year I will be an Occupational Therapist (OT). An OT helps people to be independent and participatae in areas of : self care, work and leisure activities by helping them to overcome barriers (whether they be physical, or environmental).
